sentences.en: Freedom, gravity, ego, and electron are constructs.
sentences.cn: 自由, 万有引力, 自我中心以及电子都是概念.

sentences.en: He had a massive ego, never would he admit he was wrong.
sentences.cn: 他自视甚高，从来不会承认自己错了。
他具有强烈的自我意识.

sentences.en: He has the biggest ego of anyone I've ever met.
sentences.cn: 他是我所见的最自负的人。

sentences.en: He is absolute ego in all thing.
sentences.cn: 在所有的事情上他都绝对自我.

sentences.en: I need someone to massage my bruised ego (= when you feel less confident than before ).
sentences.cn: 我需要有人来安抚我受挫的自信心。

sentences.en: I wouldn't give a straw for you female ego - it's a rag doll.
sentences.cn: 对你那女性的虚荣心,我根本不会助一臂之力,那是玩具娃娃.

sentences.en: In order to meet these requirements a mixture of empathy and ego - drive is required.
sentences.cn: 为了应付顾客多种需要,必须把“移情作用”和“ 自我 干劲”相结合.

sentences.en: It is the spy seated in the central stronghold of the ego.
sentences.cn: 它是安插在自我的中心堡垒中的暗探.

sentences.en: It's not like I'm on any kind of a personal ego trip.
sentences.cn: 并不是说我在追逐任何个人的私利.

sentences.en: Losing the match made quite a dent in his ego.
sentences.cn: 比赛失败对他的自尊心打击极大.

sentences.en: Nothing could deflate his ego / pomposity , ie make him less self - assured or pompous.
sentences.cn: 任何事都不能削弱他的自信心[气焰].

sentences.en: She has been on an ego trip since she sang on television.
sentences.cn: 她上电视台唱过歌之后就一直自吹自擂.

sentences.en: She was a prisoner of her own ego.
sentences.cn: 她为自己的自尊心所困。

sentences.en: That promotion really boosted her ego (= made her feel better about herself ).
sentences.cn: 那次晋升确实增强了她的自信心。

sentences.en: The Wall Street Journal once said that I had " an ego as big as all outdoors. "
sentences.cn: 《华尔街日报》曾说过我 “ 心比天高 ”.

sentences.en: We can't transcend the limitations of the ego.
sentences.cn: 我们无法超越自我的局限性.

words.tran_cn: [心理] 自我中心的；利己主义的
自私自利的，自我中心的
自私自利的；自我中心的；利已主义的
自我主义者；利己主义者

phrases.tran_cn: n. 密友；个性的另一面；至交

trans.tran_en: the opinion that you have about yourself
